name: Juicy Match
description:
You want new juice - you get new juice! To create brand-new products, your juice start-up in trendy Berlin-Mitte invented fruits that are alive (can you imagine?) and want to go into your juice voluntarily (in case you convince them on a more or less romantic date). 

COLLECT THEM ALL!

Will your juice get funded by the hyped juice community or is your start-up doomed?

A game made by:

Sophers - Graphics & Idea
The Paulster - Code & Idea
Made for Game Makers Iceland Jam December 2021
